servicenow-unified.description: Unified ServiceNow MCP Server - Consolidates 34 servers into 1 with 235+ tools: deployment (snow_deploy, snow_update, snow_validate_deployment), operations (snow_query_table, CRUD), UI Builder (snow_create_uib_page, workspaces), automation (snow_execute_script_with_output), local sync (snow_pull_artifact, snow_push_artifact), and ALL other ServiceNow operations. Shared OAuth, error handling, and retry logic.

snow-flow.description: Snow-Flow orchestration - Claude Agent SDK integration, swarm coordination, memory management, neural learning (TensorFlow.js), performance tracking, token usage analytics
